compliant.section: ECS frames Privacy Policy(the "Policy") and outlines what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard the collected personal information and with whom we may share it .
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.

compliant.section: Your accessing of our website at www . ecs . com . tw (the "Website") will be deemed that you accept this Policy . If you are a minor, you shall access or use the Website only after your parents(or your guardian) read and agree our Policy .

When you submit personal information and certain information from you when use or interact with our Website(hereinafter referred to as “Information”), it constitutes your consent to the use of such Information for the purpose(s)stated below .
compliant.legal provisions: Definitions of consent, Lawfulness of processing

compliant.section: ECS will not disclose, sell or provide your Information to any third party except the situations stated in this Policy and the following exceptions . With your consent .
To comply with laws and regulations or governmental requests .

To prevent, investigate, detect or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the technical integrity of the Website or our network . To protect the rights, property, or safety of ECS, the users of the Website, or the public .

ECS reserves the right to provide such Information to our officers, employees, contractors, agents, and designees to the extent necessary to enable them to execute certain web services(such as web hosting or maintenance services) for us .
All transfer, storage and use of your Information shall be subject to this Policy and applicable laws on privacy protection and personal information security .
compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section: You can set your browser to notify you when you receive a cookie, giving you the chance to decide whether or not to accept it .

Unless otherwise specified in applicable laws and regulations, you may exercise the following rights with regard to your Information upon written request: (i) any inquiry and request for a review of your Information; (ii) any request to make duplications of your Information; (iii) any request to supplement or correct your Information; (iv) any request to discontinue the collection, processing or use of your Information; (v) any request to delete your Information; and (vi) withdraw your consent.
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability, Right to object, Automated individual decision-making, including profiling

non_compliant.section: To comply with Personal Information Protecting Act and applicable laws, ECS frames Privacy Policy(the "Policy") and outlines what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard the collected personal information and with whom we may share it .
non_compliant.legal provisions: The specific law cited "Personal Information Protecting Act" is not mentioned, it's recommended to specify the legislation, especially if it's not a European Union law.
non_compliant.amend: To comply with the Personal Information Protecting Act [Specific Act Name], [Country]'s implementation of the GDPR and other applicable laws, ECS frames this Privacy Policy (the "Policy") outlining what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard it, and with whom we may share it.

non_compliant.section: The use, access or submission of personal information to the Website by you, or if you are a minor, the submission of your personal information either by your parents (or your guardian) or by you with the permission of your parents (or guardian) to ECS will be deemed as your acceptance of this Policy .
non_compliant.amend: The use, access, or submission of personal information to the Website by you, or if you are a minor, by your parents (or guardian) on your behalf, constitutes consent to this Policy.  We will obtain verifiable parental consent for the processing of personal data of a child below the age determined by EU Member State law.

non_compliant.section: Information from your use of Website Device information: Such as your device model, serial number, the version and type of your operation system, IP address and other unique device identifiers .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: Information from your use of Website Device information: We collect minimized device information, such as your device model (only when necessary for service provision), and we avoid collecting serial numbers or other unique device identifiers unless strictly necessary and with a legal basis.

non_compliant.section: Log information: Such as the settings, activation time of your devices, the network you use to connect to our Website, the status of the network, standby status, crash history, preferred interface, type and language settings of browser, diagnose and usage data, cookies as well as your usage behavior on our Website .
non_compliant.amend: Log information: We collect log information, such as the network you use to connect to our Website, browser type and language settings, and publicly available IP address. This information is used for aggregated, anonymized statistical purposes and to ensure the security and functionality of our Website. We do not use this information to identify you or track your individual behavior.

non_compliant.section: Application information: Such as the type of your installed applications or software, your usage and interaction with content offered through Website, for instance, the install and uninstall time, frequency of your usage, the category of your preferred applications and software .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: Specify the specific and limited purposes for collecting application information and ensure it's directly necessary for those purposes.

non_compliant.section: How ECS use Information ECS may use Information we collect for the purposes below: To respond to your inquiries that you request. To upgrade the quality of the Website . To assess and improve the services that ECS provides over the Website . To obtain customer feedback and to analyze user experience for the purpose of development and evaluation of new services and devices . Any other purposes with your consent .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: Clearly define and separate legitimate purposes for data use. Avoid vague terms like 'upgrade the quality' and provide specific, legitimate reasons for each use case.

non_compliant.section: Information regarding your traffic patterns may be aggregated to compile a web transaction report showing web-traffic related information, but in no event shall ECS use any of your web-traffic related information for any purpose beyond this Policy .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Storage limitation
non_compliant.amend: Define specific retention periods for web traffic data and ensure it's deleted or anonymized once its purpose is fulfilled.

non_compliant.section: Use of Cookies In order to improve our Website, ECS may use "cookies" to track your visit . A cookie is small amount of data that is transferred to your browser by a web server and can only be read by the server that gave it to you . It functions as your identification card, recording your passwords, purchases, and preferences . It cannot be executed as code or deliver viruses . Most browsers are initially set to accept cookies .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Fairness and transparency, Conditions for consent: Unambiguous indication of wishes
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with clear and concise information about the use of cookies, including their purpose, type, and duration. Obtain explicit consent before setting non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section: Since ECS’s web pages require user authorization, cookies are not optional. Users choosing not to accept cookies will probably not be able to access those pages.
non_compliant.amend: The user should be able to access core functionalities of the website without accepting cookies.  The website should provide an option to refuse cookies without disrupting the essential functionality.

non_compliant.section: ECS uses cookies to track your visit to our Website.com and log the IP/Internet address of your computer.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data - Purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: The specific and legitimate purposes for processing IP addresses should be explicitly stated. If the purpose is not essential for providing the service, consent should be obtained from the user.

non_compliant.section: ECS strives to maintain the accuracy of your Information against any accidental or malicious destruction. ECS will accommodate your requests regarding your Information; however, ECS may not be able to fulfill all your requests in the following circumstances: (i) by law; (ii) to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (iii) to prevent, investigate, detect or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the technical integrity of the Website or our network; and/or (iv) to protect the rights, property, or safety of ECS, the users of the Website, or the public.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While these exceptions are generally acceptable, the policy should be more specific about which legal obligations might prevent fulfilling user requests. It should also mention the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
